comments: Aminu (ORL) moves alongside of Butler (MIA) as marginal body contact occurs at the end of the drive.
Carter-Williams (ORL) makes incidental contact with Iguodala's (MIA) left shoulder as they each attempt to retrieve the rebound.
Olynyk (MIA) maintains his left foot as his pivot as he starts his dribble.
Aminu (ORL) jumps alongside Olynyk's (MIA) path and absorbs the marginal contact initiated by Olynyk when he veers back toward him.
Butler (MIA) engages and disengages with Ross (ORL) as they move over the screen.
Olynyk (MIA) initiates contact across Carter-Williams' (ORL) left shoulder that affects his driving shot attempt.
Olynyk (MIA) is turning slightly as marginal body contact occurs with Vucevic (ORL) at the end of the drive.
Iguodala (MIA) initiates contact with Vucevic (ORL) and moves through his space, dislodging him from his defensive position.
Ross (ORL) extends his arm across Iguodala's (MIA) front and initiates contact that restricts Iguodala's ability to retrieve the rebound.
Vucevic (ORL) and Robinson (MIA) engage and disengage with one another as Vucevic establishes post position.
Robinson (MIA) brings his right hand down and brushes Vucevic's (ORL) right arm during his upward shooting motion. The contact is marginal.

Vucevic (ORL) is naturally following through when marginal contact occurs with Robinson's (MIA) face. Contact to an opponent's head/face can be deemed marginal when the result of a natural basketball move, provided the contact is not disproportionate or uncontrolled.
Ross (ORL) has his right hand on Herro's (MIA) right hip and quickly removes it as Herro moves to set the pick.
Herro (MIA) establishes himself in a screening position in Bacon's (ORL) path and absorbs the contact.
Ross (ORL), after absorbing the initial body contact, brings his right hand forward and marginal contact occurs with Butler's (MIA) left arm after his gather.
Olynyk (MIA) engages and disengages with Vucevic (ORL) during the inbound.
Aminu (ORL) stays in bounds as he retrieves the rebound and saves the ball back into play before landing out of bounds.
Iguodala's (MIA) arm is extended outward when marginal contact occurs with Aminu's (ORL) front during rebounding.
Robinson (MIA) is moving toward Bacon (ORL) and marginal contact occurs with Bacon's front after he receives the pass.
Robinson (MIA) legally contests Bacon's (ORL) jump shot attempt.
Iguodala (MIA) and Carter-Williams (ORL) make incidental body contact with one another during rebounding.
Ross (ORL) extends his arm outward and marginal contact occurs with Butler's (MIA) upper half after the ball becomes loose.
Vucevic (ORL) receives the pass and takes more than two steps after he has gathered the ball.
